Detailed Description

Describes a message queue.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Member Function Documentation

static BOOLEAN MsgQueue::IsFocusMsgProcessingBlocked (   )  [inline, static]
 

BOOLEAN MsgQueue::PassBackFocusMsg (  const MessageReferrer &  msg_ref  )  [static]
 

Calling this method is useful if one application wants to switch the focus to another application triggered by a key press BUT wants the new focused application to handle the key event again.

BOOLEAN MsgQueue::Push (  const MessageReferrer &  msg_ref  ) 
 

Adds a MessageReferrer to the queue. Messages of category MC_FOCUS have to be added by using MsgQueue::PushFocusMsg!

Parameters:
msg_ref MessageReferrer, which should be added at the end of the queue.

BOOLEAN MsgQueue::PushFocusMsg (  const MessageReferrer &  msg_ref  )  [static]
 

Like MsgQueue::Push but only for messages of category MC_FOCUS.

static void MsgQueue::SetFocusMsgProcessingBlocked (  BOOLEAN  block  )  [inline, static]
 

void MsgQueue::TriggerIsrDataProcessing (   )  [inline]
 

BOOLEAN MsgQueue::Wait (  MessageReferrer &  msg_ref,
Ticks  timeout = Ticks::Infinite()
) 
 

Waits until the first entry of the queue can be received. The first entry will be deleted after receiving.

Parameters:
msg_ref Out-parameter, which contains the first entry of the queue.
timeout Timeout in milliseconds for waiting.
Returns:
TRUE, if the first entry could be received before the specified timeout. If FALSE is returned, the content of parameter entry is undefined.
